coreAttributes.name: ring gag
coreAttributes.description: A leather strap with a metal ring fixed into one side. When secured into position around the wearer's head, the ring is inserted into their mouth, forcing them to keep their mouth open at all times.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] [npc.her] mouth wide and [npc.verb(slide)] in the ring gag, before reaching back and fastening the buckles to keep it in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(push)] the ring gag into [npc2.namePos] mouth, before reaching back and fastening the buckles to keep it in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the ring gag into [npc2.namePos] mouth, before reaching back and tightly fastening the buckles to keep it in place.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the ring gag's straps and [npc.verb(take)] it out of [npc.her] mouth.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the ring gag's straps and [npc.verb(take)] it out of [npc2.namePos] mouth.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] impatiently [npc.verb(unfasten)] the ring gag's straps and [npc.verb(yank)] it out of [npc2.namePos] mouth.
